scripts.update:linux:darwin: npm pack && mv yyourusertag-node-red-contrib-template-$npm_package_version.tgz ./data && cd data && npm i yyourusertag-node-red-contrib-template-$npm_package_version.tgz && docker-compose restart
scripts.update:win32: npm pack && copy yyourusertag-node-red-contrib-template-%npm_package_version%.tgz .\data\ && cd .\data\ && npm i yyourusertag-node-red-contrib-template-%npm_package_version%.tgz && docker-compose restart
scripts.update:default: npm pack && mv yyourusertag-node-red-contrib-template-$npm_package_version.tgz ./data && cd data && npm i yyourusertag-node-red-contrib-template-$npm_package_version.tgz && docker-compose restart
